topic.title: Update from Tracker plugin
topic.shortdesc: How to update from the Tracker plugin to the FusionInventory plugin

body.p: Tracker is the old name of the plugin FusionInventory for GLPI.

ul.li: Download archive of the plugin here : http://forge.fusioninventory.org/projects/fusioninventory-for-glpi/files

li.p: Uncompress the file into the plugin folder of GLPI. The files list should be as follows:

ul.li: Go into the menu Configuration > Plugins

li.p: Install FusionInventory. The plugin will update the plugin. The speed of the update process may vary (from a few seconds to several minutes/hours) depending on how old is your version of Tracker and the amount of data stored by the plugin.

body.p: These operations will modify tables and data in the MySQL database and rights on the plugin.
